item.title: Football Manager is coming to Netflix
item.dc:creator: Elliot Fagan-Briggs

The post Football Manager is coming to Netflix appeared first on FCP.
item.content:encoded:
The latest instalment of the award winning series, Football Manager, is coming to Netflix.

Developers Sports Interactive announced today that their mobile version of the game, FM24 Mobile will be coming to Netflix gaming on November 6th.

If you have a Netflix membership you can play the game via the Netflix mobile app, and you can also download the game from the App Store on IOS and Android and play if youâ€™re logged into Netflix on the same device.

FM24 Mobile will not be available via Netflix on Smart TVs, PCs, Laptops and Games Consoles.

Football Manager 2024 releases everywhere November 6th.

The post Football Manager is coming to Netflix appeared first on FCP.
